GK17kvrtrsuu:0: Kedārabhaṭṭa: Vṛttaratnākara, with Sulhaṇa's Sukavihṛdayānandinī prathamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GK17kvrtrsuu:2: saśrīkaṃ prabhayā yutaṃ rucirayā prodbhāsitaṃ gaṅgayā nānāvaktravirājitaṃ śaśikalāpīḍocchrayā 'laṅkṛtam /
GK17kvrtrsuu:3: āryopetamupasthitākhilagaṇasrakpūjitaṃ sarvadā chaṃdaḥśāstramiveśvarasya jayati trailokyavaṃdyaṃ vapuḥ // 1
GK17kvrtrsuu:4: kṛṣṇātreyasya gotre samajani purā dākṣiṇātyāgraṇīryo velādityābhidhānaḥ sukavirabhavadbhāsvarastasya sūnuḥ /
GK17kvrtrsuu:7: śāstrāraṃbhe śāstrakāra iṣṭādhikṛtadevatānamaskārapūrvakaśāstrasaṃbaṃdhaprayojanaṃ ślokatrayeṇāha sukhasaṃtānasiddhyarthaṃ natvā brahmācyutārcitam /
GK17kvrtrsuu:10: tasya putro 'sti kedāraḥ śivapādārcane rataḥ // KVrk_1.2 //
GK17kvrtrsuu:14: śivo devatā yeṣāṃ tāni śaivāni śāstrāṇi /
GK17kvrtrsuu:15: vedārthāśca śaivaśāstrāṇi ca tāni jānātīti sa tathoktaḥ ya pavyeko nāma dvijottamo 'bhūttasya pavyekasya kedāranāmā śivacaraṇārādhanaparaḥ putro
GK17kvrtrsuu:18: lakṣyamudāharaṇaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ niyatākṣaramātrāgaṇaracanā tābhyāṃ saṃyutaṃ lakṣalakṣaṇasaṃyutam
GK17kvrtrsuu:21: vṛttāni śrīprabhṛtīni tānyeva ratnāni teṣāmākara utpattisthānam /
GK17kvrtrsuu:32: lokaśaṃkaraṃ lokānāṃ śaṃ sukhaṃ karotīti lokaśaṃkarastam /
GK17kvrtrsuu:36: gaurīvināyakopetaṃ gaurī ca vināyakaśca gaurīvināyakau tābhyāṃ upetaṃ saṃyutam /
GK17kvrtrsuu:39: sukhaṃ paraṃ brahmānandātmakaṃ saṃtānaḥ putrapautrādi tayoḥ siddhiḥ prāptistadarthaṃ sukhasaṃtānasiddhyartham
GK17kvrtrsuu:55: adhīyanta ityadhyāyāste ca vakṣyamāṇalakṣaṇāḥ saṃjñābhidhānamātrāvṛttasamavṛttārdhasamavṛttaviṣamavṛttaṣaṭpratyayalakṣaṇāḥ ṣaḍeva ṣaḍbhirnibaddhasya chandaḥśāstrasya pramāṇaṃ saṃkhyā ṣaṭtriṃśadadhikaṃ śataṃ vijñeyam atha gaṇanāmāha /
GK17kvrtrsuu:57: samastaṃ vāṅmayaṃ vyāptaṃ trailokyamiva viṣṇunā // KVrk_1.6 //
GK17kvrtrsuu:67: gmadhyādyau jbhau trilo no 'ṣṭau bhavantyatra gaṇāstrikāḥ // KVrk_1.7 //
GK17kvrtrsuu:68: asmin chandaḥśāstre sarve guravo yasyāsau sarvagurmo magaṇo yathā ( _ _ _
GK17kvrtrsuu:69: mukhāntarlau yarau mukhamādi aṃtarmadhyaṃ ādau madhye laghū yayostau mukhāntarlau yagaṇaragaṇau aṃtagalau satau /
GK17kvrtrsuu:70: aṃte avasāne gurulaghū yayostau sagaṇatagaṇau yathā ( ^ ^ _, _ _ ^) /
GK17kvrtrsuu:72: guru madhye ādau yayostau jagaṇabhagaṇau yathā ( ^ _
GK17kvrtrsuu:75: ete mayarasatajabhanā 'ṣṭau gaṇā bhavanti varṇavṛttagaṇā bhavantītyarthaḥ /
GK17kvrtrsuu:78: trikā iti trayaḥ parimāṇaṃ yeṣāṃ te trikā iti || 7 ||
GK17kvrtrsuu:82: āryāprabhṛtiṣu mātrāvṛtteṣu catuḥkalā pañca gaṇā jñātavyāḥ /
GK17kvrtrsuu:84: sarvādimadhyāṃtaguravaḥ sarve ca te ādiśca madhyaṃ ca antaśca sarvādimadhyāṃtāsteṣu guravo yeṣāṃ te sarvādimadhyāntaguravaḥ /
GK17kvrtrsuu:88: vā pādāntastvasau gvakro jñeyo 'nyo mātṛko lṛjuḥ // KVrk_1.9 // iti /
GK17kvrtrsuu:95: parimitākṣaramātro gaṇāracito vakṣyamāṇalakṣaṇo vṛttasya caturthāṃśaḥ pādastasyānte vartamāno laghurapi vibhāṣayā guruḥ syāt /
GK17kvrtrsuu:96: sa ca kavisamayavyavahārāt dvitīyacaturthayoreva pādayorante veditavyaḥ /
GK17kvrtrsuu:99: asaṃbhave hemamayasya jantostathā 'pi rāmo lulubhe mṛgāya // iti /
GK17kvrtrsuu:101: ‘śriyaḥ patiḥ śrīmati śāsituṃ jagajjagannivāso vasudevasadmani'; ityādi dṛṣṭavyam /
GK17kvrtrsuu:102: sa ca prastāre vakraḥ sthāpya laghulakṣaṇamāha /
GK17kvrtrsuu:104: anusvarādirahito anyo mātṛko ekamātro varṇo laghurbhavati /
GK17kvrtrsuu:106: yuktaparāśca ya ityanena prāpte gurutve apavādamāha /
GK17kvrtrsuu:109: vibhaktyaṃtaṃ padaṃ tasya padasyādau vartamāno yo varṇastasya saṃyogaḥ /
GK17kvrtrsuu:111: tena krameṇa purovartinā prākpadāṃte vartamānasya prāptagurubhāvasyāpi laghutā syāt /
GK17kvrtrsuu:113: nanu ka eṣaḥ kramo nāma saṃyoga ucyate /
GK17kvrtrsuu:114: pūrvācāryāṇāṃ piṃgalanāgaprabhṛtīnāṃ kālidāsādīnāṃ ca kavīnāṃ samayaḥ parigṛhītaḥ /
GK17kvrtrsuu:118: taruṇaṃ sarṣapaśākaṃ navaudanaṃ picchalāni ca dadhīni /
GK17kvrtrsuu:121: tava hriyāpahriyā mama hrīrabhūt śaśigṛhe 'pi hṛtaṃ na dhṛtā tataḥ /
GK17kvrtrsuu:122: vahalabhrāmarameṣakatāmasam mama priye kva sa yeṣyati tatpunaḥ //
GK17kvrtrsuu:123: iti nidravyo hriyameti hrīparigataḥ prabhraśyate tejasaḥ nistejaḥ paribhūyate paribhavānnirvedamāgacchati
GK17kvrtrsuu:124: nirviṇṇaḥ śucameti śokavivaśo buddhyāḥ paribhraśyate nirbuddhiḥ kṣayametyaho nidhanatā sarvāpadāmāspadam
GK17kvrtrsuu:128: paurā nāryastaralanayanānandamutpādayantyo dhāvanti sma drutamapahriyaḥ sraṃsamānottarīyāḥ // iti /
GK17kvrtrsuu:130: yajñairyeṣāṃ pratipadamiyaṃ maṇḍitā bhūtadhātrī nirjityaitadbhuvanavalayaṃ yaiḥ pradattaṃ dvijebhyaḥ /
GK17kvrtrsuu:131: te 'pyetasmin gurubhavahṛde budbudastambhalīlaṃ dhṛtvā dhṛtvā sapadi vilayaṃ bhūbhujaḥ saṃprayātāḥ //
GK17kvrtrsuu:142: sthitaśayitavibuddhaprītikaste bhramo 'yaṃ bhramasi bhramara yena tvaṃ mudhā ketakeṣu //
GK17kvrtrsuu:146: asamagravilokanena kiṃ te dayitaṃ paśya varoru nirviśaṃkā /
GK17kvrtrsuu:147: na hi jātu kuśāgrapītamambhaḥ sucireṇāpi karotyapetatṛṣṇam // iti hrasaṃyogena yathā /
GK17kvrtrsuu:169: pūrvārdhottarārdhagrahaṇāt pūrvārdhottarārdhamityāryālakṣaṇaṃ kurvāṇo granthakāra evaṃ jñāpayati
GK17kvrtrsuu:193: vakṣyamāṇalakṣaṇasya vṛttasya caturthāṃśo bhāgaḥ pādasaṃjño bhavet /
GK17kvrtrsuu:197: abdhyādi śabdāddhi sāṃkāḥ kṛtvā yatirityanena saha saṃbadhyante /
GK17kvrtrsuu:210: śriyaḥ śreyakapolau tu sampūrṇendusamaprabhau pratibimbaṃ hareryatra kastūrī maṇḍanāyate /
GK17kvrtrsuu:227: vyaktāvyaktavibhaktika iti yatiḥ sarvatra pādānta ityanena saha saṃbadhyate /
GK17kvrtrsuu:248: yo yaṃ pūrvaparayorekadeśaḥ svarasaṃdhau vidhīyate sa kvacitpūrvāntavadbhavati kvacitparasyādivat
GK17kvrtrsuu:257: dhanyaḥ paśyati yudhyamānamiti sasvāṃgaṃ vimānasthitaḥ // ityādi /

GK17kvrtrsuu:272: prathamatṛtīyādikaṃ sthānaṃ ayuk viṣamaṃ dvitīyacaturthādikaṃ sthānaṃ yuksamamiti /

GK17kvrtrsuu:278: tatra samaṃ sarvāvayavatvātsamam śrīprabhṛti ardhasamamupacitrādi viṣamaṃ padacaturūrdhādi

GK17kvrtrsuu:296: pṛthak chando bhavet pādair yāvat ṣaḍviṃśatiṃ gatam // KVrk_1.17 //

GK17kvrtrsuu:375: atrārdhagrahaṇātpādavyavasthā nāstīti etacca prathamādhyāya eva padādāviti sūtre prapaṃcitamasti

GK17kvrtrsuu:400: prītiṃ kasya na janayati prakurvatī keśabaṃdhanaṃ nārī /

GK17kvrtrsuu:433: sadyo manāṃsi madayati gītiḥ strīṇāṃ madena mattānām || 8 ||

GK17kvrtrsuu:455: ṣaḍviṣame 'ṣṭau same kalāstāśca same syurno nirantarāḥ /

GK17kvrtrsuu:462: yatra viṣame pāde prathame tṛtīye ṣaṭkalā mātrā bhavanti same pāde dvitīye caturthe aṣṭau kalā bhavanti /
GK17kvrtrsuu:463: ante 'vasāne ragaṇalaghū guruḥ ca bhavatastadvṛttaṃ vaitālīyaṃ nāma /
GK17kvrtrsuu:467: samā dvitīyacaturthādikā parāśritā tṛtīyapaṃcamādyāśritā na bhavati /
GK17kvrtrsuu:468: same pāde dvitīye caturthe nirgatamaṃtaraṃ vyavadhānaṃ yāsāṃ tā nirantarā aṃtararahitā laghavo na bhaveyurityarthaḥ /
GK17kvrtrsuu:471: virahe tava sā varāṃganā vaitālīyamuvāha vibhramam || 12 ||

GK17kvrtrsuu:490: vaitālīyameva sarveṣvapi pādeṣu dvitīyo laghu tṛtīyena saha yukto bhavati
GK17kvrtrsuu:491: ‘na samā 'tra parāśritā kale'ti bādhitvā tadā dakṣiṇāntikā nāma /
GK17kvrtrsuu:496: ayugmayoḥ prathamatṛtīyayoḥ pādayoḥ dvitīyo laghuragrimena tṛtīyena laghunā saha yujyate tadā vaitālīyamevodīcyavṛttirnāma yathā /
GK17kvrtrsuu:499: pūrveṇa yuto 'tha paṃcamaḥ prācyavṛttiruditeti yugmayoḥ // KVrk_2.17 //
GK17kvrtrsuu:501: samapādayordvitīyacaturthayoḥ paṃcamo laghuḥ pūrveṇa caturthena laghunā saha yukto yadā syāttadā prācyavṛttirnāma vaitālīyaṃ bhavati /
GK17kvrtrsuu:506: pūrvoktayorudīcyaprācyavṛttyoḥ samau sadṛśau aujayugmakau viṣamasamau pādau yadā bhavataḥ tadā vaitālīyameva pravṛttakaṃ syāt /
GK17kvrtrsuu:511: asya pravṛttakasya samapādakṛtā samapādalakṣaṇayuktaiścaturbhiḥ pādai racitā aparāntikā nāma
GK17kvrtrsuu:516: pravṛttakasyaiva viṣamapādalakṣaṇayuktaiścaturbhiḥ pādaiḥ racitā cāruhāsinī nāma yathā /
GK17kvrtrsuu:517: na kasya cetaḥ samanmathaṃ karoti sā suṃdarākṛtiḥ /

GK17kvrtrsuu:529: yujoḥ samapādayorcaturthādakṣarājjena jagaṇena pareṇa vaktrameva pathyeti kīrtitam /
GK17kvrtrsuu:540: yadyayujorviṣamayoḥ pādayoścaturthādakṣarānnagaṇo bhavet tadā vaktrameva capalā bhavati /
GK17kvrtrsuu:545: yasyāṃ laḥ saptamo yugme sā yugmavipulā matā // KVrk_2.25 //

GK17kvrtrsuu:549: vipulādhikārasyedānīmārabhyamānatvāt vinā 'nutpattiḥ pathyālakṣaṇaṃ tvayukpāde avaśyameva yagaṇena bhavitavyam /
GK17kvrtrsuu:553: prītiḥ svakāntayā sārdhaṃ vipulā jāyate gṛhe || 25 ||
GK17kvrtrsuu:555: saitavasyācāryasya matena caturṣvapi pādeṣu saptamo laghuḥ kartavyaḥ /

GK17kvrtrsuu:567: ayujoriti jātipakṣe dvayorapi pādayorgrahaṇam vyaktipakṣe punarekasya /

GK17kvrtrsuu:575: tathā jitaḥ śatruvargo rājan bāhubalena te /
GK17kvrtrsuu:581: kāminībhiḥ saha prītiḥ kasya nāma na rocate /
GK17kvrtrsuu:582: yadi na syādvārivīcicaṃcalaṃ hata jīvitam // iti || 28 ||
GK17kvrtrsuu:592: pratyādiśyanta iva me dṛṣṭalakṣyabhidaḥ śarāḥ // ityādi || 29 ||

GK17kvrtrsuu:596: tṛṣṇeyaṃ re tāta śriyaṃ saṃcitāṃ vipulāṃ hare -

GK17kvrtrsuu:1415: bhatrayamojagataṃ guruṇī cedyuji ca najau jyayutau drutamadhyā // KVrk_4.2
GK17kvrtrsuu:1416: yasyārdhasamavṛttasya auje viṣame prathame tṛtīye pāde bhagaṇatrayaṃ dvau gurū yadi yuji same dvitīye caturthe nagaṇajagaṇau jagaṇayagaṇau ca tadvṛttaṃ drutamadhyā nāma /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1422: viṣame pāde trayaḥ sagaṇā guruśca yuji same bhavaṇatrayaṃ dvau gurū ca tadā vegavatī nāma
GK17kvrtrsuu:1428: auje viṣame pāde prathame tṛtīye tagaṇātparau jagaṇaragaṇau guruścedyadi bhavati anoje same dvitīye caturthe pāde magaṇasagaṇajagaṇā gurū ca bhavanti tadvṛttaṃ bhadravirāṭ nāma /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1432: asame sajau saguruyuktau ketumatī same bharanagādgaḥ // KVrk_4.5 //
GK17kvrtrsuu:1433: asame viṣame pāde sagaṇajagaṇasagaṇā guruśca same dvitīye caturthe bhagaṇaragaṇanagaṇā dvau gurū ca tadvṛttaṃ ketumatī nāma /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1437: ākhyānikī tau jagurū gamoje jatāvanoje jagurū guruścet // KVrk_4.6 //
GK17kvrtrsuu:1438: auje prathame tṛtīye pāde tagaṇau dvau jagaṇo gurū ca anoje dvitīye caturthe jagaṇatagaṇau jagaṇo dvau gurū ca tadvṛttaṃ ākhyānikī nāma /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1440: ye ye tvayā saṃjati śatrubhūpā hatā hatāśeṣavipakṣavarga /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1442: jatau jagau go viṣame same syāttau jgau gameṣā viparītapūrvā // KVrk_4.7
GK17kvrtrsuu:1443: yasya prathame tṛtīye pāde jagaṇatagaṇajagaṇā dvau gurū ca same pāde dvau tagaṇau jagaṇo dvau gurū ca tadvṛttaṃ viparītākhyānikī nāma /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1445: dhruvaṃ samāgacchati jīviteśa śrutvādikāruṇyaparaṃ vaco me /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1449: sayugātsalaghū viṣame gururyuji nabhau ca bharau hariṇaplutā // KVrk_4.8
GK17kvrtrsuu:1450: yasyā viṣame pāde sagaṇatrayaṃ laghugurū ca same pāde nagaṇabhagaṇau bhagaṇaragaṇau ca tadvṛttaṃ hariṇaplutā nāma /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1454: ayuji nanaralā guruḥ same njamaparavaktramidaṃ tato jarau // KVrk_4.9 //
GK17kvrtrsuu:1455: viṣame pāde nagaṇau ragaṇo laghuśca guruśca bhavanti same pāde nagaṇajagaṇau jagaṇaragaṇau tadvṛttaṃ aparavaktraṃ nāma /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1460: ayuji nayugarephato yakāro yuji ca najau jaragāśca puṣpitāgrā // KVrk_4.10
GK17kvrtrsuu:1461: yasya viṣame pāde nagaṇadvayaṃ ragaṇātparo yagaṇaḥ same nagaṇajagaṇau jagaṇaragaṇau guruśca tadvṛttaṃ puṣpitāgrā nāma /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1463: śaśimukhi sakhi muñca mānamasyā madanamahotsava eṣa yāti śūnyā //
GK17kvrtrsuu:1467: syādayugmake rajau rajau same tu jarau jarau gururyavātparā matīyam //
GK17kvrtrsuu:1468: yasya viṣame pāde ragaṇajagaṇau ragaṇajagaṇau same jagaṇaragaṇau jagaṇaragaṇau guruśca tadvṛttaṃ yavātparāmatīyaṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1471: ātmasātkṛtā tvayā ripūn vijitya samagrasainyasaṃyutānapi prasahya || 12 ||
GK17kvrtrsuu:1472: iti sulhaṇaviracitāyāṃ sukavihṛdayānandinyabhidhānāyāṃ vṛttaratnākaracchaṃdovṛttau ardhasamavṛttādhyāyaḥ caturthaḥ /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1487: satatamanavarataṃ iti vividhaiścaturviṃśatiprakāraprastāreṇa vicitraiḥ pādaiḥ prāptasauṃdaryaṃ tadvṛttaṃ ācāryaiḥ padacaturūrdhvaṃ nāmoktam /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1492: padacaturūrdhvaṃ na calanti tatraiva nipatanti saśalyāḥ //
GK17kvrtrsuu:1500: prathamamuditavṛtte padacaturūrdhve viracitān viṣamān aṣṭaudvādaśaṣoḍaśaviṃśatyakṣarān padān bhajatīti tasmin viṣamacaraṇabhāji iha chaṃdasi āṅā kalito yuktaḥ pīḍo bhavati /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1505: vidhṛtarucirāṇāṃ pādānāṃ vitatyā yatirvirāmo yasya sa tathoktaḥ /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1506: ante gurudvayopādanādatra śeṣāṇāṃ laghutvamasyānujñānaṃ kedāreṇeti manyāmahe /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1509: prasarati malayamaruti virahavatīnāṃ smarasuhṛdi vijayini bhavati niyatamasuvināśaḥ //
GK17kvrtrsuu:1510: dvigurūṇi chaṃdasi āpīḍeti trayāṇāṃ gurūṇāṃ apraveśācchargaṇḍa iti nāma noktam /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1514: itaraditaracaraṇajanitamapi ca turyaṃ caraṇayugakamavikṛtamaparamiha kalikā sā // KVrk_5.3
GK17kvrtrsuu:1515: āpīḍasya prathamaṃ turyaṃ caturthaṃ itaracaraṇasamutthaṃ dvitīyapādaṃ dvādaśākṣaropalakṣitaṃ lakṣma śrayati bhajati /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1523: sakaluṣamuṣi sapadi vidhuvanāyāḥ tadanu vimanamanasi mudamiha janayati nivāsā || 3 ||
GK17kvrtrsuu:1525: caraṇa iha hi lakṣma prakṛtamaparamakhilamapi yadi bhavati lavalī sā // KVrk_5.4 //
GK17kvrtrsuu:1526: yasyāstṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ prathamacaraṇaracitaṃ lakṣaṇamanubhavati dvābhyāṃ gurubhyāṃ yutā sakalacaraṇānāmanto yasyāḥ sā tathoktā lavalī nāma /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1527: aparaṃ lavalyāṃ sarvamapi prāktanaṃ prastutaṃ pūrvavaditi bhavati /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1530: janayati ca lavalyāḥ calamiti sarasaṃ bhuvidbhavipariṇati(?) paripīḍaḥ || 4 ||
GK17kvrtrsuu:1537: śaśadharamukhi sakhi parirambhaṃ tava mama vapuṣi malayajarasaniṣekaḥ /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1539: piṃgalanāgastu padacaturūrdhvādiṣu prathamapādaviparyāse sati maṃjaryādi nāmāni vīkṣyati || // padacaturūrdhvaprakaraṇam //
GK17kvrtrsuu:1542: tryaṅdhrigatabhanajalā gayutā sajasā jagau caraṇamekata paṭhet // KVrk_5.6
GK17kvrtrsuu:1543: prathamapāde sagaṇajagaṇasagaṇā laghuśca tathā dvitīyapāde nagaṇasagaṇajagaṇaguravo bhavanti
GK17kvrtrsuu:1545: caturthe caraṇe sagaṇajagaṇasagaṇā jagaṇo guruśca yatra sā udgatā nāma /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1550: vīkṣya sapadi yuvatiṃ vikṛtiṃ niyataṃ prayāti vipulodgatāstanuḥ || 6 ||
GK17kvrtrsuu:1552: rnau bhagau bhavati saurabhakaṃ caraṇe yadīha bhavatastṛtīyake // KVrk_5.7
GK17kvrtrsuu:1553: yadyudgatāyāstṛtīye pāde ragaṇanagaṇabhagaṇaguravo bhavanti tadā saurabhakaṃ nāma vṛttaṃ bhavet
GK17kvrtrsuu:1557: nayugaṃ sakārayugalaṃ ca bhavati caraṇe tṛtīyake /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1558: taduditamurumatibhirlalitaṃ yadi śeṣamasya khalu pūrvatulyakam // KVrk_5.8
GK17kvrtrsuu:1559: yadyudgatāyāstṛtīye caraṇe dvau nagaṇau dvau sagaṇau ca bhavataḥ tadā lalitaṃ nāma /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1563: iyamatinayati mudā pramattā purato vayasya tava lāsyamuttamam || 8 ||
GK17kvrtrsuu:1566: msau jbhau gau prathamāṅdhrirekataḥ pṛthaganyat tritayaṃ sanajaragāstathā nanau saḥ /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1568: yasya prathame pāde magaṇasagaṇajagaṇabhagaṇā dvau gurū ekataḥ /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1570: dvitīye pāde sagaṇanagaṇajagaṇaragaṇā guruśca tathā tṛtīye pāde dvau nagaṇau sagaṇaścaturthe nagaṇatrayaṃ jagaṇayagaṇau ca tadvṛttaṃ upasthitapūrvaṃ upasthitapracupitamityarthaḥ /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1574: nau pāde 'tha tṛtīyake sanau nasayuktau prathamāṅdhrikṛtayatistu vardhamānam /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1575: tritayamaparamapi pūrvasadṛśamiha bhavati pratatamatibhiriti gaditaṃ khalu vṛttam // KVrk_5.10
GK17kvrtrsuu:1576: tadeva padacaturūrdhvaṃ tṛtīye pāde nagaṇau sagaṇanagaṇau ca bhavataḥ prathamasya caturūrdhvasyāṅdhiḥ prathamāṅdhrivat kṛtā yatiryasya kriyāviśeṣaṇasya tatprathamāṅdhrikṛtayatiryathā bhavati evamaparapādatrayaṃ pūrvasadṛśamiha tantre tadvṛttaṃ ācāryairvardhamānaṃ nāmoktam /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1580: asminneva tṛtīyake pāde tajarā syuḥ prathame ca viratirārṣabhaṃ bruvanti /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1581: tacchuddhavirāṭpuraḥ sthitaṃ tritayamaparamapi yadi pūrvasamaṃ syāt //
GK17kvrtrsuu:1582: asminneva padacaturūrdhvavṛtte tṛtīye pāde tagaṇajagaṇaragaṇā bhaveyuḥ,
GK17kvrtrsuu:1583: aparaṃ pādatrayamapi pūrvasamaṃ bhavati tadā śuddhavirāṭpuraḥsthitaṃ ārṣabhaṃ vadanti śuddhavirāḍārṣabhamityarthaḥ
GK17kvrtrsuu:1589: yacchaṃdo noktamatra gātheti tatsūribhiḥ proktam // KVrk_5.12 //
GK17kvrtrsuu:1590: viṣamākṣarāṇi yeṣu te pādā yasmin viṣamākṣarapādaṃ yadevameva aṣṭau daśasaptanavākṣaraṃ vā sarvapādairasamaṃ tripādaṃ ṣaṭpādaṃ vā daśadharmavat /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1592: daśa dharmaṃ na jānanti dhṛtirāṣṭra nibodha tān /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1594: tvaramāṇaśa bhīruśca lubdhaḥ kāmī ca te daśaḥ // iti ṣaṭpadī gāthā /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1595: ityevamādi asmin cchaṃdasyarthe noktaṃ prayogeṣu dṛśyate tadgātheti vidvadbhiruktam /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1598: iti sulhaṇaviracitāyāṃ sukavihṛdayānandinyabhidhānāyāṃ vṛttaratnākaracchaṃdovṛttau viṣamavṛttādhyāyaḥ paṃcamaḥ //
GK17kvrtrsuu:1603: saṃkhyā caivādhvayogaśca ṣaḍete pratyayāḥ smṛtāḥ // KVrk_6.1 //
GK17kvrtrsuu:1606: yathopari tathā śeṣaṃ bhūyaḥ kuryādamuṃ vidhim // KVrk_6.2 //
GK17kvrtrsuu:1609: pāde sarvagurau yāvatāṃ varṇānāṃ vṛttasya pādastāvaṃta eva guravo vilikhyante /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1611: caturakṣaracchaṃdasi ādyādguroradhaḥ adhovibhāge laghuṃ varṇaṃ nyasya sthāpayitvā tadanaṃtaraṃ nyastalaghoḥ sakāśāt śeṣebhyo varṇebhyo adhaḥ kiṃ sthāpyata ityāha /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1613: yadyupari gurustadā adhastādapi gururyadyupari laghustadā adhastādapi laghuḥ śeṣam /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1617: laghuṃ nyasya guroradhaḥ yathopari tathā śeṣamiti punarapyamuṃ vidhiṃ kuryāt /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1618: yadā upari gururbhavati laghuṃ nyasya guroradha iti vidherabhāvādyaḥ pūrvadeśādūne dadyādgurūṇi iti ūnapradeśo gurubhiḥ pūryata ityarthaḥ /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1619: evamanena prakāreṇa tāvannyāsaḥ kartavyo yāvatsarvalaghuḥ pado bhavati /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1626: naṣṭasya yo bhavedaṃkaḥ tasyārdhe 'rdhe same ca laḥ /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1628: prastāradarśitānāṃ vṛttānāṃ madhye yadvṛttaṃ naṣṭaṃ luptaṃ bhavati tasya naṣṭasya yo bhavedaṃka ekādisaṃkhyā tasya ardhe 'rdhe same ca aṃke sati lo laghurbhavati /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1629: viṣame ekaṃ ādhāya prakṣipya tasyārdhe 'rdhe gururbhavet /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1631: tasya aṃkaḥ paṃca sa ca ardhaṃ na prayacchati /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1635: tadardhe guruḥ prāpyate punastrayo 'rdhaṃ na prayacchanti /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1643: ādyau dvau gurū tābhyāṃ parako laghustato gururiti /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1648: laghusthā ye tu tatrāṃkāstaiḥ saikairmiśritairbhavet // KVrk_6.5 //
GK17kvrtrsuu:1649: kenacittadvṛttaṃ prastāryakatamat iti saṃkhyāparijñānā uktaṃ taduddiṣṭamucyate /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1652: atra punarvṛttaṃ jñāyate saṃkhyā na jñāyate ataḥ saṃkhyāparijñānārthaṃ uddiṣṭamidamucyate
GK17kvrtrsuu:1653: tasya uddiṣṭavṛttasya prathamādakṣarādārabhya upari dviguṇānaṃkān samālikhet /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1655: asminneva caturākṣare chaṃdasi ekaṃ vṛttaṃ uddiṣṭaṃ tasya dvau varṇau gurū tato laghustato 'pi guruḥ /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1656: tatra uddiṣṭe vṛtte laghuni tiṣṭhantīti laghusthā ye punaraṃkāścatvāraḥ taiścaturbhiḥ saikaiḥ ekena sahitaiḥ paṃcabhiruddiṣṭaṃ bhavet /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1665: yāvaṃta eva vṛttabhavā varṇā tāvata eva saikān ekasahitānyathā /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1666: caturakṣarajātau catvāro ye varṇāstān saikān paṃca /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1667: auttarādharyataḥsthitān uparyuparibhāvena sthitān ekādikrameṇaiva etānupari upari nikṣipet nidadhyāt /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1670: evamanena prakāreṇa kasmādiyaṃ ekadvyādilagukriyāṃ pravartata ityāha /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1676: ‘pāde sarvagurāvādyāllaghuṃ nyasye'ti tena tasmāt adha iyaṃ ekadvyādilagukriyā pravartate
GK17kvrtrsuu:1677: tatra paṃcasu varṇeṣu uttarādharabhāvena sthāpiteṣu adhaḥsthita ekastaduparisthe nikṣipyate
GK17kvrtrsuu:1678: sa ca tathaiva tiṣṭhati tyajannekaikamūrdhvata iti vīpsavaśādekadaiva sthitimaṃtareṇa nikṣiptatvāt punarnikṣepabhāvādekaikatyāgaśca na saṃbhavati tasmātsvarūpeṇa sthita eva upari kṣipyate /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1679: tato dvitīye sthāne dvau varṇau bhavataḥ tau tṛtīyena kṣipyeta tatra trayo bhavanti /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1680: tacca caturthe nikṣipyante te catvāro bhavanti /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1682: tyajannekaikamūrdhvataḥ' uparitanamekaṃ tyajyate tatra na kṣipyate ityarthaḥ /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1683: vīpsā ta eva adhobhāgāt punarnikṣepe kriyā pravartate tena adhaḥsthita eva eko dvitīye sthāne nikṣipyate tatra ca trayo bhavanti /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1684: tacca tṛtīye nikṣipyante tatra ṣaṭbhavanti upari ekaṃ tyajannivarteta /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1685: ādyaṃ ekaṃ vṛttaṃ sarvaguruḥ tasmāddekadvyādilagukriyā pravartete /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1686: tata ekaḥ sarvaguruḥ catvāri dvilaghūni ṣaṭtrilaghūni catvāri caturlaghūni ekaṃ sarvalaghuḥ eṣā lagukriyā sarvalaghuprastāreṇa pratīyate asyāstu eṣa eva kramaḥ paṃcākṣarādivṛtteṣvapi [udāharaṇam -
GK17kvrtrsuu:1691: lagukriyāyāṃ ye aṃkāsteṣāṃ sandohastasminvimiśrite pīḍīkṛte saṃkhyā bhavet
GK17kvrtrsuu:1693: tathā ekaścatvāraḥ ṣaṭcatvāraḥ ekameṣāmekīkṛtā vai ṣoḍaśa bhavanti caturakṣarajātau prastāryamāṇāyāṃ ṣoḍaśa vṛttāni bhavantītyarthaḥ /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1696: uddiṣṭasya vṛttasya upari ye aṃkā dviguṇāsteṣāṃ samāhāraḥ ekībhāvaḥ saiko vā athavā janayedutpādayedimāṃ saṃkhyām /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1698: caturakṣarajātau dviguṇā ye aṃkā uparyāropitāsteṣāṃ samāhāraḥ paṃcadaśa saikaḥ ṣoḍaśeti || [adhvayogaḥ]
GK17kvrtrsuu:1702: caturakṣarajātau yā ṣoḍaśasaṃkhyā syāddviguṇā dvātriṃśatiḥ ekonā ekarahitā ekatriṃśatiḥ sadbhiḥ paṇḍitairadhvā mārgaḥ prakīrtitaḥ /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1705: adhunā punarapi kaviranvayapūrvakaṃ pitrā saha sātmānaṃ nirddiśati /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1710: vaṃśe 'nvaye 'bhūjjātaḥ kaśyapasya kaśyaṃ somaṃ pibatīti kaśyapaḥ kaśyapaśabdena yadyapi surā evābhidhīyate kathyate /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1711: tathāpyatra somamucyate surāpānasya brāhmaṇe dije niṣiddhatvāt anvayārthena vaṃśārthena kranuyāyitvamuktaṃ syāt (?) /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1712: śivasya ete śaivā ye siddhāntāsteṣāṃ vettā /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1716: yo hi vicārayati cintayati so avaśyaṃ vetti nahyaviditaṃ vicārayituṃ śaknoti viśeṣeṇa pratipūrayati svargāpavargādikāni sa vipraḥ vimalataramatiḥ vimalā vistīrṇā taralā manoharā matiryasya atiśayena vimalamatiḥ /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1719: kedāranāmā tasya putraḥ śivaḥ śānto devatāviśeṣaḥ tasyārādhanaṃ tatra ekāgraṃ tanniṣṭhaṃ cittaṃ yasya saḥ /
GK17kvrtrsuu:1720: tathā tena kedāreṇābhirāmaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ manoharaṃ chaṃdaḥ prakarṣeṇa viracitaṃ vṛttaratnākarākhyām
GK17kvrtrsuu:1721: iti paṃḍitaśrīsulhaṇaviracitāyāṃ sukavihṛdayānandinyabhidhānāyāṃ chaṃdovṛttau ṣaṭpratyayādhyāyaḥ ṣaṣṭhaḥ samāptaḥ //
